full_summary:
### Request for Proposal | Transcription Services of Audio-Digital Recordings

#### Notice Reference Number
WS4645118695 - Doc4652760471

#### Tender Deadline
29 July 2024, 14:00EDT

#### Background
The Government of Canada is seeking proposals from qualified Offerors to provide professional transcription services for digital recordings in both official languages, representing legal hearings to the Immigration and Refugee Board (IRB) of Canada. This procurement aims to engage multiple contractors for up to four contracts, with work divided into two streams and three tiers.

#### Key Documents and Contact Information

*   Request for Proposal (RFP): [Download from Ariba Discovery](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20122454?extsite=MjAxMjI0NTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
*   Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Contact: Campbell, April (SPAC/PSPC)
    April.campbell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Key Requirements

*   Up to four contracts may be awarded to qualified Offerors.
*   Work will be divided into two streams (English and French) and three tiers.
*   Bids must be submitted electronically through Ariba Discovery by 14:00 EDT on July 29, 2024.

#### Industry Codes and Trade Agreements

*   UNSPSC Code: 82111604 - Transcribing services
*   Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

Please refer to the Request for Proposal document for detailed information and specifications.

- Ability to understand and interpret government and contractor documentation
- Necessary skills to paraphrase or rephrase text into a more professional format
- Careful attention to adding all key and relevant details from the source information, without omitting any important information. 
- Multilingual skills in French and English is also preferably needed since the raw data contained French text. \
